officialTitle: Is PECS Block Equivalent to Paravertebral Block in Preventing Postoperative Pain After Breast Surgery? A Randomized, Controlled, Double-blind, Multicenter Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* adult patients
* ASA class 1 to 3 patients
* patients scheduled for elective breast mastectomy or quadrantectomy
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* patients' refusal
* contraindication to regional anaesthesia (coagulopathies, concurrent anticoagulant therapy, allergy to local anaesthetics, infection at puncture site)
